papers.title: Deep Learning Based ECG Signal Classification
papers.description: Proposed a CNN-based framework for automatic ECG signal classification to detect cardiac abnormalities with high accuracy.

papers.title: Respiratory Sound Analysis using AI
papers.description: Designed a deep learning model to classify respiratory sounds for early detection of lung diseases.

papers.title: Crop Disease Detection using Computer Vision
papers.description: Developed a CNN-based model to detect crop diseases using leaf images to support smart agriculture.
